articles.author: John Wagner
articles.title: Broad majorities of Americans oppose key provisions of restrictive Texas abortion law, poll finds - The Washington Post
articles.description: A majority of respondents to the Monmouth University poll also say they disagree with the Supreme Court’s decision to allow the new law to take effect.
articles.content:
In the Monmouth University Poll, 70 percent of Americans say they disapprove of allowing private citizens to use lawsuits to enforce the law rather than having government prosecutors handle cases.

articles.author: Zack Colman
articles.title: Biden administration to write workplace safety rule tackling heat stress - POLITICO
articles.description: Extreme heat kills more Americans than any other climate-related hazard.
articles.content: Rising temperatures pose an imminent threat to millions of American workers exposed to the elements, to kids in schools without air conditioning, to seniors in nursing homes without cooling resources… [+2094 chars]
